overview:
Jen runs marketing for DoubleDutch. She joined the team in April 2011.

Prior to DoubleDutch she worked as a Community and Marketing Manager at Medpedia, a collaborative health start-up based in San Francisco. During her time there, she worked directly with end-users, engineers, and the product team to build the website from nothing. In less than 2 years, the site had over 10,000 pages of rich medical content and over 8,000 active vetted medical professionals.

She has also spent time working for a non-profit abroad and in regional brand development for lululemon. She holds a marketing degree from Georgetown University in Washington, DC.
